<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>runes-nameid-address-balances</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/btc/{network}/runes/{nameOrId}/addresses/{address}/balances"}></MethodEndpoint>



Returns balance of a specific Rune name or ID of a specific address
